plugins.name: session
plugins.description: Developer productivity tools for analyzing coding sessions, tracking accomplishments, and knowing when to take a break

plugins.name: feature-map
plugins.description: Point at any codebase and generate a GTM-focused feature map. Translates technical capabilities into buyer outcomes, business lift, and competitive positioning using a team of parallel agents.

plugins.name: gtm
plugins.description: Go-to-market engine. Scan any codebase, determine ICP, research competitors, build positioning, generate landing pages, and create outbound sequences.
